<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<dfasdl xmlns="http://www.dfasdl.org/DFASDL" semantic="custom">
  <seq id="joomla_assets">

      <str db-column-name="rules" id="joomla_assets_row_rules" max-length="5120"/>

  </seq>
  <seq id="joomla_associations" db-select="SELECT id, context, `key` AS k FROM joomla_associations">

  </seq>
  <seq id="joomla_banners">

      <num db-column-name="sticky" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_banners_row_sticky" max-digits="1"/>
      <num db-column-name="ordering" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_banners_row_ordering" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="metakey" id="joomla_banners_row_metakey" max-length="65535"/>

      <str db-column-name="metakey_prefix" id="joomla_banners_row_metakey_prefix" max-length="255"/>
      <num db-column-name="purchase_type" id="joomla_banners_row_purchase_type" max-digits="4"/>
      <num db-column-name="track_clicks" id="joomla_banners_row_track_clicks" max-digits="4"/>
      <num db-column-name="track_impressions" id="joomla_banners_row_track_impressions" max-digits="4"/>

      <num db-column-name="version" defaultnum="1" id="joomla_banners_row_version" max-digits="10"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>

  </seq>
  <seq id="joomla_categories">

      <str db-column-name="description" id="joomla_categories_row_description" max-length="16777215"/>
      <num db-column-name="published" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_categories_row_published" max-digits="1"/>
      <num db-column-name="checked_out" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_categories_row_checked_out" max-digits="11"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="checked_out_time" id="joomla_categories_row_checked_out_time"/>
      <num db-column-name="access" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_categories_row_access" max-digits="10"/>
      <str db-column-name="params" id="joomla_categories_row_params" max-length="65535"/>
      <str db-column-name="metadesc" id="joomla_categories_row_metadesc" max-length="1024"/>
      <str db-column-name="metakey" id="joomla_categories_row_metakey" max-length="1024"/>

      <num db-column-name="hits" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_categories_row_hits" max-digits="10"/>
      <str db-column-name="language" id="joomla_categories_row_language" max-length="7"/>
      <num db-column-name="version" defaultnum="1" id="joomla_categories_row_version" max-digits="10"/>

  <seq id="joomla_contact_details">
    <elem id="joomla_contact_details_row">
      <num db-column-name="id" id="joomla_contact_details_row_id" max-digits="11"/>

      <str db-column-name="telephone" id="joomla_contact_details_row_telephone" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="fax" id="joomla_contact_details_row_fax" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="misc" id="joomla_contact_details_row_misc" max-length="16777215"/>
      <str db-column-name="image" id="joomla_contact_details_row_image" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="email_to" id="joomla_contact_details_row_email_to" max-length="255"/>
      <num db-column-name="default_con" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_contact_details_row_default_con" max-digits="1"/>
      <num db-column-name="published" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_contact_details_row_published" max-digits="1"/>
      <num db-column-name="checked_out" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_contact_details_row_checked_out" max-digits="10"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="checked_out_time" id="joomla_contact_details_row_checked_out_time"/>
      <num db-column-name="ordering" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_contact_details_row_ordering" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="params" id="joomla_contact_details_row_params" max-length="65535"/>
      <num db-column-name="user_id" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_contact_details_row_user_id" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="catid" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_contact_details_row_catid" max-digits="11"/>

  <seq id="joomla_content" db-select="SELECT id, asset_id, title, alias, introtext, `fulltext` AS f, state, catid, created, created_by, created_by_alias, modified, modified_by, checked_out, checked_out_time, publish_up, publish_down, images, urls, attribs, version, ordering, metakey, metadesc, access, hits, metadata, featured, language, xreference FROM joomla_content">

      <num db-column-name="asset_id" defaultnum="0" id="joomla_content_row_asset_id" max-digits="10"/>

      <str db-column-name="metadata" id="joomla_content_row_metadata" max-length="65535"/>
